comment._content: archiver.rootsweb.ancestry.com/th/read/NEW-ZEALAND/2013-0... Press, 20 February 1915, Page 13 ON SERVICE. THE NEW ZEALAND ROLL. IN ARMY AND NAVY. LONDON, January 5. That New Zealanders abroad have not been slow to tender their services in defence of the Empire will be evident from the following list of those who are at present on service with the British Army and Navy and Auxiliary Forces. Abraham, L. M. (Palmerston North); student at Cambridge; Corporal King Edward's Horse; now 2nd Lieutenant Royal Field Artillery
